page.title: 02Yehudi Menhuin StokeDabernon
page.content: The{Yehudi Menuhin School}is a music school. Yehudi Menuhin formed the school 21 years ago. The building is old and is set in beautiful grounds. You need talent to be accepted at the school. Each day is divided between lessons and music. There are 45 children in the school who are arranged in groups of 4 to 7 for teaching. Ages range from 8 to 18. The children rise at 6.30am and go to bed at 9.30pm. {The drive}is lined with very tall trees which prevent much light getting through. The grounds are impressive. There is a small clump of woodland in the middle of a beautiful lawn. There are tennis courts, a swimming pool and a football pitch. All the children agree that it is great fun being at the school.
